thread.section_title: Expedia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Expedia | www.expedia.ca
thread.title: William Kroes

author: William Kroes
title: William Kroes
text: Do not book a Hotel room here! Customer service is horrible.... Booked here dozens of times, never needed them! Then once I booked here by phone, and they made a mistake! So when arriving at the hotel, we only had rooms for 3 people instead of 5! With confirmation on email from their own employee, they just sayd sorry, cant't help you ather waiting on the phone for 5 hours, speaking to 9 agents! Cost me 570 US $ + international roaming costs for telephone use (more then â‚¬70)! Please, do yourself a favour and don't book here!
